name: Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke o: Tenshi no Hanabira Zome
summary: Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke o: Tenshi no Hanabira Zome is an adult visual novel and the eighth game in the Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke o series of games. It features the series' fifth couple. While class representative Shizuku Kirishima has foreign exchange student Eris Shitogi under her wing, a faintly glowing love settles into her heart. However, Shizuku, worried sick thinking her nagging personality landed her on her crush's bad side, actually gets a confession straight to her face from Eris.
